name: educado-backend
description: Monorepo for Educado backend and frontend

scripts.dev:backend: docker compose up -d strapiDB && cd strapi && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fullstack: docker compose up -d strapiDB && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.generate-api: turbo run generate-spec && turbo run generate-strapi-client
scripts.release:web:patch: npm version patch --workspace=web && npm run tag:web
scripts.release:web:minor: npm version minor --workspace=web && npm run tag:web
scripts.release:web:major: npm version major --workspace=web && npm run tag:web
scripts.release:strapi:patch: npm version patch --workspace=strapi && npm run tag:strapi
scripts.release:strapi:minor: npm version minor --workspace=strapi && npm run tag:strapi
scripts.release:strapi:major: npm version major --workspace=strapi && npm run tag:strapi
